cause.description:
The group promotes the legalization of same-sex marriage, recognizing that marriage is a universal right, regardless of sexual orientation. Love is love and should be cherished wherever found. What can you do?
    1. You can help by donating to the HRC through our cause. Every penny helps, so any donation is helping our cause. 2. Invite your friends to the cause. 3. Write your local congressperson and let them know you want to see same-sex marriage legalized. Where does donated money go? Money donated to this cause goes to the Human Rights Campaign. HRC is is America’s largest civil rights organization working to achieve gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender equality.

    Submit Your Logo! Simply use the "Legalize Love" theme in your logo and we'll post it! Just click post media item and enter the link to your photo. 1. Everyone deserves to be treated equally 2. Marriage is a universal right, regardless of sexual orientation
cause.name: One Million for Same-sex Marriage!
